p: Ethyl-1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-(pyridin-4-yl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylate (4). Purification by column chromatography eluting ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:9 → 3:7) afforded the product as a yellowish oil in 72% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ: 7.17 − 7.14 (m, 4H); 7.05 − 6.99 (m, 4H); 4.19 − 4.12 (m, 2H); 3.12 (d, J = 15.54, 1H); 2.82 (t, J = 8.1, 1H); 2.30 (s, 3H); 2.07 (d, J = 15.69, 1H); 1.93 − 1.88 (m, 1H); 1.46 (t, J = 6.72, 1H); 1.24 (t, J = 9.03, 3H).
